name: WarOfFields
description:
Originally a school game to understand surfaces in mathematics.

2 players compete against each other, the red farmer and the blue farmer, to get the biggest field around their farm.

the farmers take turns putting up enclosures of random size obtained with the dice. Fields can only be placed next to his farm or another field of his color. If the field cannot be placed, it is necessary to pass his turn (middle mouse button or menu at the top right) The number of turns is limited to 15. At the end, the one with the largest field wins.
